sentences.sContent: She was assigned a job to help Jews by talking to them and helping them cope with shock and disorientation at the train station.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was assigned a job to help Jews by talking to them and helping them cope with shock and disorientation at the train station.
sentences.sCn: 工作的内容是用来帮助犹太人与他们谈话，并帮助他们应付犹太人的冲突和犹太人在火车站迷失方向事情。

sentences.sContent: When death strikes suddenly from the shadows or claws at us until the last breath, those left behind experience numbness and disorientation.
sentences.sContent_eng: When death strikes suddenly from the shadows or claws at us until the last breath, those left behind experience numbness and disorientation.
sentences.sCn: 当死亡突然从暗处袭来或抓向我们直至最后一息时，在麻木和迷惑背后的那些东西保留了下来。

words.tran: 无判断力的；分不清方向或目标的
使…迷惑（disorient的过去时和过去分词）
